posts.title: Are you ready for a challenge? Join Grid Dynamics
posts.paragraph: Join our team of brilliant colleagues who are competent, innovative, disciplined and fearless.

posts.title: Grid Dynamics in Poland
posts.paragraph: Meet the Grid Dynamics team in Krakow. Our team will share our values, culture, and more. Enjoy the video!

posts.title: Grid Dynamics I We are Grid Dynamics
posts.paragraph:
This year something changed in the whole world. We made the distance between us and our colleagues.
With only one idea - to be on the safe side.
